text: (3 November 1927 - 9 January 2018) was a Norwegian politician and writer. He was a member of the Labour Party. He was Prime Minister of Norway from 1976 to 1981. Nordli died in Oslo on 9 January 2018 of prostate cancer at the age of 90.Odvar Nordli er d√∏d ==References== ==Other websites== * Documentary featuring Nordli Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Prime ministers of Norway Category:Norwegian writers
title: Odvar Nordli
